page.title: 13ATTITUDES M WAKLEY
page.content:
Gittisham 1985 The last few years have seen many newcomers to the village. People who want to live in the lovely surroundings but who do not appear to accept the villagers way of life. Change is inevitable, but does it have to be so sudden and so drastic ? I cannot help wondering why Gittisham is being made to lose its quiet way of life for a more 'modern' image. Why newcomers must have their way immediately and why they can't integrate gradually, and indeed why some want to take over and others show no interest at all? Why the Village shop and Post office aren't patronised -both these facilities could be forced to close if not supported.
No, for me Gittisham 1985 has lost its magic.
